tv.generator-info-name: Processed by Open-EPG Visual Processor v1.0

programme.title: The Bikeriders
programme.desc: This compelling and star-studded film, inspired by a photo book by Danny Lyon, follows the rise and transformation of a Chicago-based biker gang into a dangerous gang in the 1960s.

programme.title: Bagman
programme.desc: A dark and terrifying horror. When his childhood tormentor returns, threatening the safety of his family, a father desperately struggles against his deepest inner fear.

programme.title: Robots
programme.desc: AI brings together two unlikely people in this romcom. A womaniser and a gold-digger learn humanity when they are forced to team up and pursue robot doubles of themselves.

programme.title: Rearview Mirror
programme.desc: A suspenseful thriller. A young mother tries to escape her abusive, controlling husband and start a new life in an idyllic, peaceful beach town.

programme.title: Dig
programme.desc: A compelling home invasion thriller. A widowed father and his daughter are taken hostage by a dangerous couple who wont stop until they retrieve what lies beneath their property.

programme.title: One True Loves
programme.desc: Adapted from the novel by bestselling author Taylor Jenkins Reid. A woman finds herself torn between her fiance and her husband, who is believed to be dead. Who is her one true love?

programme.title: James Acaster: Hecklers Welcome
programme.desc: Comedian James Acaster explores his love-hate relationship with stand-up by relinquishing control of his set and accepting a healthy dose of heckling.

programme.title: Noahs Ark
programme.desc: This musical animation follows the adventures of two mice who attempt to board Noahs Ark with the help of an ingenious cockroach and sheer luck.

programme.title: Rob Peace
programme.desc: Chiwetel Ejiofor stars and directs this emotional drama. An underprivileged, gifted young black man reaches Yale University, only for past injustices to threaten his future.

programme.title: 10 Lives
programme.desc: A charming and hilarious animation. After losing his ninth life, a pampered and selfish cat is offered a chance to make amends with nine new lives as a different creature each time.

programme.title: September 5
programme.desc: This gripping and tense retelling of a historical tragedy earned an Oscar nomination. An American sports broadcasting crew captures the 1972 Munich Olympics hostage crisis.

programme.title: The Lord Of The Rings: The War Of...
programme.sub-title: The Lord Of The Rings: The War Of The Rohirrim
programme.desc: The epic anime prequel to the beloved fantasy franchise. Hera, King Helms daughter, must lead the fight against an enemy seeking vengeance.

programme.title: Ghostbusters: Frozen Empire
programme.desc: Its all hands on deck in this exciting sequel to 2021s hit reboot. It brings together Ghostbusters, new and old, as they try to save the world from a second ice age.

programme.title: High Ground
programme.desc: An action-packed thriller. A border town sheriff faces a brutal cartel after a mysterious prisoner is brought into his jail.

programme.title: Lee
programme.desc: A heartbreaking journey with Kate Winslet, who gives a gripping act as Lee Miller, a WWII photographer. While grappling with her traumas, she struggles to convey the devastation of war.

programme.title: The Brutalist
programme.desc: Adrien Brody delivers an Oscar-winning performance for this epic period drama. A visionary architect escapes postwar Europe for America, meeting a wealthy client who changes his life.

programme.title: Sumotherhood
programme.desc: Its a chaotic comedy-of-errors in this British crime comedy. Two hapless friends run into trouble after an attempted bank robbery goes wrong.

programme.title: The Farm
programme.desc: A touching drama based on a true story. A couple tries to navigate the ups and downs of life after inheriting a farm.

programme.title: Joika
programme.desc: A gripping film inspired by a remarkable true story. An American ballet dancer who dreams of becoming a great ballerina is accepted into Moscows elite Bolshoi Ballet Academy.

programme.title: The Secret Kingdom
programme.desc: A thrilling fantasy adventure. At their new home, Peter and his sister are drawn into an underground kingdom, where Peter is declared the king and must save the realm from evil.

programme.title: Upon The Magic Roads
programme.desc: An epic live-action fairy tale fantasy. Foal and his friend John go on an adventure where they will have to outsmart a tyrant king, catch the firebird, and find Johns true love.

programme.title: The Wish Of Fairy Fish
programme.desc: An adventure-filled fairy tale fantasy. If you go fishing, be prepared to draw the fish of your dreams, the magical Pike, which can grant any three wishes.

programme.title: The Miracle Club
programme.desc: A brilliant female cast drives this heartwarming 1967-set film. A group of Catholic women win tickets to visit the sacred French town of Lourdes in the hope of a miracle.

programme.title: Dog Man
programme.desc: A charming, heartwarming book-inspired animated adventure. As Dog Man - a dog and human hybrid - embraces his new identity, he must take down feline supervillain Petey the Cat.

programme.title: Mountainhead
programme.desc: Succession creator Jesse Armstrong delivers a starry satire about the superrich during a meltdown. A group of tech gurus meets for a boys trip as an international crisis unfolds.

programme.title: Love Hurts
programme.desc: A riveting action comedy. A realtor is pulled back into his old life by his former partner-in-crime. With his crime-lord brother also on his trail, he must confront his past.

programme.title: Cleaner
programme.desc: An action-packed hostage thriller. An ex-soldier turned window cleaner is forced into action when a group of radical activists seize an energy companys gala, holding it hostage.

programme.title: Alma and The Wolf
programme.desc: An intriguing psychological horror mystery. While investigating a mysterious wolf attack, a police officers son disappears and he begins to lose his grip on reality.

programme.title: The Image Of You
programme.desc: An intriguing psychological thriller based on a book. Anna falls in love with a man, but her twin sister Zoe doesnt trust him and sets out to discover the truth about him.

programme.title: Wicked Little Letters
programme.desc: A witty period dramedy. A rowdy Irish migrant is accused of sending letters full of hilarious profanities to the people of Littlehampton. Suspicious, the towns women investigate.

programme.title: Batman Begins
programme.desc: Christopher Nolan directs and Christian Bale stars in this critically acclaimed superhero reboot that sees Batman take on a crime-ridden Gotham City.

programme.title: Jerry Maguire
programme.desc: Sport meets romance in this Tom Cruise rom-com that showed us the money! A successful sports agent who loses everything is determined to get back what he once had.

programme.title: Ray
programme.desc: Jamie Foxx gives an Oscar winning performance in this biographical drama. A child with an extraordinary talent suffers a tragedy but his music eventually takes the world by storm.

programme.title: The Skeleton Key
programme.desc: This thrilling horror with Kate Hudson is filled with secrets and death as Hudson, a hospice nurse, finds herself working at a run-down and menacing New Orleans plantation.

programme.title: 57 Seconds
programme.desc: A thrilling action film starring Josh Hutcherson and Morgan Freeman. When a tech blogger finds a time-altering ring, he uses it to exact revenge on an evil pharmaceutical company.

programme.title: Blue Streak
programme.desc: Martin Lawrence stars in this crime comedy. An ex-con pretends to be a cop in order to retrieve a diamond he stashed in a police station, but gets caught up in something bigger.

programme.title: Shrek The Third
programme.desc: Mike Myers and a great cast return for a third instalment to the franchise. After the king falls ill, Shrek, Fiona and friends must defend the kingdom from Prince Charming.

programme.title: The Lord Of The Rings: The Return...
programme.sub-title: The Lord Of The Rings: The Return Of The King
programme.desc: Good takes on evil in this Oscar-winning epic. The hobbits try to destroy the One Ring while a war is waged for Middle-Earth.

programme.title: Aquaman And The Lost Kingdom
programme.desc: The long-anticipated sequel to the 2018 release. Black Manta seeks revenge on Aquaman for his fathers death.

programme.title: Last Seen Alive
programme.desc: Gerard Butler shows there are no limitations when trying to find the truth. After a mans estranged wife disappears, he takes the law into his own hands while evading the authorities.

programme.title: Bad Boys: Ride Or Die
programme.desc: The fourth entry in the epic buddy cop franchise. As always, Will Smith and Martin Lawrence find themselves in a precarious situation as they are framed and on the run.

programme.title: Long Shot
programme.desc: In this hilarious rom-com, a romance brews between Seth Rogen and Charlize Theron when a presidential candidate hires a neighbour from her childhood as her speechwriter.

programme.title: xXx: The Next Level
programme.desc: In this action-packed thriller, rapper Ice Cube takes on the task of an ex-US Navy SEAL recruited into the XXX program. His mission is to stop the US Presidents assassination.

programme.title: A Day To Die
programme.desc: The high-octane action thriller places Kevin Dillon in a desperate race against time. An ex-military ops officer has one day to raise $2 million to save his kidnapped wife.

programme.title: Rent A Groom
programme.desc: A delightful romantic comedy. To please her sickly grandma, a woman hires an actor to pretend to be her fiance, but their simple ruse develops into something serious.

programme.title: Twisted Sisters
programme.desc: A dark and twisted thriller. After a freshman is lured into a sorority, her life begins to unravel to the point of murder.

programme.title: The Marry Me Pact
programme.desc: A delightful romance film. A woman visits a psychic who tells her she is destined to be with her male best friend. However, he returns home engaged after his travels.

programme.title: Demolition Man
programme.desc: Sylvester Stallone stars in this action classic. A notorious cop and psychopathic killer who were cryogenically frozen are defrosted years later, with chilling results.

programme.title: Deep Blue Sea
programme.desc: Samuel L. Jackson and Thomas Jane star in this deep-sea shark thriller. Scientists create killer sharks while searching for a cure for Alzheimers disease. Now they are being hunted.

programme.title: Beetlejuice
programme.desc: Tim Burton and Michael Keaton team up to make a creepy, dark, fun experience. A recently deceased couple hire a sleazy ghost to get rid of their homes new occupants.

programme.title: Shrek Forever After
programme.desc: Shrek makes a deal with Rumpelstiltskin to get back his ferocious self. But he gets sent to an alternate version of Far Far Away instead.

programme.title: Meet The Fockers
programme.desc: Ben Stiller and Robert De Niro return for this wacky sequel. This time round, its a clash of family values as the Byrnes family meets the Focker family for the first time.

programme.title: Dune: Part 2
programme.desc: The second instalment in an epic two-part adaptation of Frank Herberts acclaimed novel. Paul Atreides unites with Chani and the Fremen while on a warpath of revenge.

programme.title: Mean Girls
programme.desc: A musical twist on a modern classic. A new student is a hit with an A-list girl clique called the Plastics. However, everything changes when she falls for the wrong guy.

programme.title: Kandahar
programme.desc: Gerard Butler fights against the odds in this war movie. A CIA operative and his translator flee from special forces in Afghanistan after exposing a covert mission.

programme.title: Maggie Moore
programme.desc: Jon Hamm drives this crazy, over-the-top crime comedy based on actual events. A police chief is suddenly faced with the back-to-back murders of two women with the same name.

programme.title: The Devils Light
programme.desc: A mystery-filled horror. A Catholic nun believes she is answering a calling to be the first female exorcist - but who or what called her?

programme.title: Ouija: Origin Of Evil
programme.desc: A chilling prequel to the terrifying horror. A widowed mother of two runs a seance scam. To improve her show, she buys a Ouija board, not knowing it will invite evil into their home.

programme.title: Fifty Shades Freed
programme.desc: The steamy conclusion of the sexy franchise sees Anastasia and Christian get married - but their happily-ever-after is threatened by a stalker from the past.

programme.title: As Good As It Gets
programme.desc: Jack Nicholson and Helen Hunt turn out Oscar-winning performances in this comedy about a cranky writer, a tolerant waitress, a gay artist and a sick dog.

programme.title: Blind Ambition
programme.desc: An inspiring documentary that will surely capture your heart. Four Zimbabwean refugees become the most unlikely sommeliers and compete in the Wine Tasting Championships.

programme.title: Mercury Rising
programme.desc: Bruce Willis flexes his action muscle in this fast-paced thriller about an FBI agent who must save a nine-year-old autistic savant who has become the target of assassins.

programme.title: 3 Days In Malay
programme.desc: A gripping WWII action film inspired by a true story. A group of Marines must defend their airfield in Malay against the Japanese for three days.

programme.title: Past Lives
programme.desc: This tragic Oscar-nominated romantic drama gives two lost lovers another chance. After twenty years apart, childhood sweethearts reunite for one fateful week in New York City.

programme.title: Monster House
programme.desc: A young boy realises that his neighbours house is possessed by a malevolent spirit who hungers for children. With Halloween approaching, the boy must protect his friends and stop the spirit.

programme.title: Bee Movie
programme.desc: Looking for a family film with a moral and Jerry Seinfelds observational humour? Then the story of Barry, the bee who leaves the hive for a big adventure, is just up your path.

programme.title: The Croods
programme.desc: A star-studded cast ensures this Academy Award-nominated classic will amuse adults and kids alike. A prehistoric family goes on the journey of a lifetime

programme.title: The School Of Rock
programme.desc: This upbeat, endearing, musical comedy earned Jack Black a Golden Globe nomination as he gave a class of preppy students a music lesson in rock and roll theyll never forget.

programme.title: The Kingdom
programme.desc: Filled with riveting action sequences, The Kingdom is a politically charged action drama from Battleship director Peter Berg, with Jamie Foxx leading a heavyweight cast.

programme.title: Night School
programme.desc: Kevin Hart and Tiffany Haddish face off in this hilarious comedy. A group of misfit grown-ups are forced to take night classes to get their high school qualifications.

programme.title: Scary Movie
programme.desc: Anna Faris stars in this crazy horror spoof. A group of dumb teenagers accidentally killed a man and get rid of the body. A year later they are stalked by a clumsy serial killer.

programme.title: 47 Meters Down: Uncaged
programme.desc: A deepsea thriller. Four teen girls diving in an underwater ruin quickly learn theyve entered the territory of the deadliest shark species in the claustrophobic labyrinth.

programme.title: Let Us Make Eve
programme.desc: A chilling thriller. Friends, bound together by a murder they committed as teens, journey to celebrate their friendship in Belize, but they dont know their lives are in danger.

programme.title: Forsaken
programme.desc: John Henry returns to his hometown to repair his relationship with his estranged father, but a local gang is terrorising the town. John Henry is the only one who can stop them.

programme.title: Arranged Love
programme.desc: A delightful romcom about a woman who left an arranged marriage and inheritance in India and began her own company. But when a problem threatens it, marriage is the solution.

programme.title: Vampires House Of Cain
programme.desc: A fanged crime thriller. A detective investigating a series of murders is caught in a war between two Vampire clans.

programme.title: The Big Bounce
programme.desc: Oscar-winning actor Morgan Freeman and Owen Wilson make mischief in this comedy about a con artist who gets in over his head. Lies and double deals make this an entertaining watch.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes: A Game Of Shadows
programme.desc: Robert Downey Jr and Jude Law return for another action-packed mystery. This time Holmes is on the trail of Professor Moriarty who is committing crimes across Europe.

programme.title: Anger Management
programme.desc: Jack Nicholson and Adam Sandler face off in this crazy comedy. A man is wrongly sentenced to anger management treatment and is assigned to an eccentric therapist.

programme.title: Back To The Dinosaurs
programme.desc: An exciting sci-fi adventure. Two youngsters find a mysterious spacecraft that transports them into the dinosaurs era, needing them to race against time to return home.

programme.title: The Star
programme.desc: An all-star cast lends their voices to this Biblical animated adventure that explores the story of the first Christmas through the eyes of a small but brave donkey.

programme.title: Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa
programme.desc: The gang returns for another crazy adventure. This time, their plane crash-lands, leaving them stranded in the middle of Africa, where Alex is reunited with his parents.

programme.title: Playing With Fire
programme.desc: Wrestler-turned-actor John Cena stars in this funny family comedy. When an elite firefighter team rescues three siblings, they face a task that they are not ready for: babysitting.

programme.title: Gravity
programme.desc: The suspense and tension are unending in this multiple Oscar-winning drama. When disaster strikes, an astronaut and engineer are stranded in space.

programme.title: American Gangster
programme.desc: Oscar winner Denzel Washington stars in this crime driven biopic set in the 70s. A hard, honest cop works to take down a new heroin kingpin who has secured the underworld.

programme.title: Endangered Species
programme.desc: A wildlife thriller. Jack takes his friend and family to Kenya on vacation. But they get into an accident with a rhino in the reserve, leaving them to fight for their survival.

programme.title: Any Given Sunday
programme.desc: A driven, intense look at American football from Oscar winning director Oliver Stone. An all-star cast explores the toil and passion behind a young football teams rise to fame.

programme.title: Killing Field
programme.desc: Chad Michael Murray and Bruce Willis star in this action thriller. A grieving battle veterans life is disrupted when a cop and a drug cartel arrive on his property.

programme.title: Blinding Lights
programme.desc: A young aspiring female singer struggling with addiction wants to make it big in the Atlanta music scene. She decides to overcome the strikes she has against her family.

programme.title: The Ex Obsession
programme.desc: An accidental death leads to stolen identity when a woman coerces her husband to assume her dead exs identity. Their desperate cover-up spirals into obsession.

programme.title: The First Noelle
programme.desc: An ambitious young book editor named Noelle attempts to win back her ex after he returns home for Christmas with a new girlfriend, who also happens to be named Noelle.

programme.title: The Curious Case Of Benjamin Button
programme.desc: An Oscar-winning romantic drama based on a F. Scott Fitzgerald story. Brad Pitt stars as a man born already in his eighties who must live his life ageing in reverse.

programme.title: The Holiday Dating Guide
programme.desc: A delightful holiday romcom. To satisfy her publisher, a dating coach must prove her advice works by making a man fall for her by Christmas Eve in 12 days.

programme.title: The Perfect Score
programme.desc: A crime-filled comedy about six students who decide to break into their school to steal the answers to an upcoming exam. With luck on their side, they all score high grades.

programme.title: The Barkers: Mind The Cats!
programme.desc: An adventure-filled animation. While on holiday with his dog family, Kid is eager to play with his siblings, but they are too busy. Luckily, Kid finds new friends: Cats.

programme.title: The Emoji Movie
programme.desc: This adorable animation with an ensemble cast explores the world inside our phones, where emojis live and one multi-expressional emoji heads off on an adventure to discover his purpose.

programme.title: I Am Legend
programme.desc: Will Smith fights for survival in this gripping post-apocalyptic film. When a plague kills most of mankind and changes the rest into monsters, a man fights to find a cure.

programme.title: Fortress 2: Snipers Eye
programme.desc: The sequel to the action cyber thriller Fortress. Weeks after the deadly assault on Fortress Camp, Robert (Bruce Willis) makes a daring rescue to save the widow of his old nemesis.

programme.title: Jason Bourne
programme.desc: Oscar winner Matt Damon reprises his role as the CIAs most dangerous former operative. Hes on a mission to uncover more truths about his past in this explosive action-thriller.

programme.title: Inception
programme.desc: Not many films rival the visual spectacle of Christopher Nolans sci-fi epic. Leonardo DiCaprio and a stellar cast enter peoples dreams to steal corporate secrets.

programme.title: Mad Max Beyond Thunderdome
programme.desc: The third Mad Max film sees an exiled Mel Gibson and a tribe of kids battle Tina Turner in a swirl of stunning stunts, gladiatorial fighting, and general post-nuclear mayhem.

programme.title: The Last Job
programme.desc: Oscar winner Richard Dreyfuss seeks revenge on those who wronged him in this thriller. After his savings are stolen, a former mob boss returns to his old ways to find the thieves.

programme.title: Deadly DILF
programme.desc: A compelling thriller. A harmless flirtation between a college girl and the hot dad next door turns deadly when she becomes obsessed with him and tries to destroy his marriage.

programme.title: Twisted Vines
programme.desc: A murder mystery that will keep you guessing. A wedding at a vineyard estate turns deadly when a body is discovered, and all the guests turn into suspects.

programme.title: Our Almost Completely True Story
programme.desc: A sincere and hilarious love story. A short Jewish man pursues a tall, ageing Hollywood star.

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: This historical drama ties the loose ends of an award-winning show of the same name. It shows the lives of a family and its servants as they navigate through changes in society.

programme.title: Arthur
programme.desc: Russell Brand drives this remake of an 80s classic. A rich playboy must choose between a marriage that will ensure his lavish lifestyle or a financially uncertain future with his true love.

programme.title: Abominable
programme.desc: An exciting animated adventure. An encounter with a Yeti, targeted by a rich man, sets teenage Yi and her two friends on an adventure to return the magical creature to his home.

programme.title: Nanny Mcphee And The Big Bang
programme.desc: Oscar winner Emma Thompson writes and stars in this fun family film. A mysterious nanny arrives to help a struggling mom with her kids and the farm while their father is at war.

programme.title: Vanguard
programme.desc: Iconic martial arts actor Jackie Chan drives this action-adventure film. A highly trained security company is hired to protect an accountant after a mercenary group targets him.

programme.title: Justice League
programme.desc: An ensemble cast brings the legendary comic book league to life in this superhero movie. When Earth is attacked by an alien force, Batman recruits the help of the planets mightiest heroes.

programme.title: The Ice Road
programme.desc: Liam Neeson leads this riveting film about a diamond mine that collapses in Canada. A big-rig road driver leads a rescue mission over a frozen lake to save some trapped miners.

programme.title: Miami Vice
programme.desc: Director Michael Mann (Heat) teams up with Golden Globe winner Colin Farrell and Oscar winner Jamie Foxx to reboot the 80s classic crime show about Miamis top vice detectives.

programme.title: The Boy
programme.desc: An intimate portrait of a 9-year-old sociopaths growing fascination with death.

programme.title: Conspiracy Theory
programme.desc: An engrossing thriller starring Mel Gibson. A conspiracy theory-obsessed New York cab driver becomes a target for the CIA when one of his theories happens to be true.

programme.title: The Pitt
programme.desc: With the Pitt understaffed, Robby looks to his team to pick up the slack. While Whitaker supports the wife of a burn victim, Samira takes the lead on a young gamer who suffered a stroke.

programme.title: Yellowjackets
programme.desc: The Yellowjackets attempt to spin a hundred suspicions into proof. Coach Scott has an existential meltdown and wonders if the universe really does hate him.

programme.title: FBI
programme.desc: When the teams sex trafficking sting operation goes sideways, they race to recover a human trafficking victim. Meanwhile, Maggie makes a connection with a 911 operator to help find the girl before she disappears.

programme.title: Steinheist
programme.desc: The biggest corporate scandal in South African history, Steinhoffs fall, led to a loss of R200 billion.

programme.title: Bookie
programme.desc: An exciting season premiere. Danny heads to Modesto in search of Sandra, but soon finds himself at odds with his eccentric mother-in-law.

programme.title: Survivor Australia
programme.desc: An action-packed premiere. Brain vs Brawn battled it out four years ago in the Australian Outback. As the rematch begins, this generation of Brawn brings muscle and smarts. But can they dethrone the Brains?

programme.title: Riki Rhino: The Bird Kingdom
programme.desc: A fun, family adventure. Riki, a brave rhino, and his duck friend Beni journey through a tropical jungle to find a magic seed that will help save their home from a foreseen tsunami.

programme.title: Americas Got Talent
programme.desc: In the 20th season of this Emmy-nominated reality competition, the search continues for the countrys best talent. Howie Mandel, Sofía Vergara, and Simon Cowell return, joined by Mel B.

programme.title: Carte Blanche
programme.desc: What led to the death of a diplomat in Paris? What lies in the dark heart of the police? A historic locomotive gets a second lease on life.

programme.title: Survivor Australia: Australia V The...
programme.sub-title: Survivor Australia: Australia V The World. S12/E7 - Tastes Like Victory
programme.desc: The race is on as Australian and World Survivor heavyweights continue to clash for the title of International Sole Survivor.

programme.title: Law and Order: Organized Crime
programme.desc: A new wave of art activism puts the city on high alert and Vargas in the hot seat, Stabler is brought into a new unit to clear his old team from being their prime suspect.

programme.title: FBI: International
programme.desc: The Fly Team leads an international manhunt when an American woman and her new husband flee from Baltimore to Istanbul with her young son after a heinous murder.

programme.title: Americas Got Talent
programme.desc: In the 20th season of this Emmy-nominated reality competition, the search continues for the countrys best talent. Howie Mandel, Sofía Vergara, and Simon Cowell return, joined by Mel B.

programme.title: The Rookie
programme.desc: A danger-riddled premiere. Now recovering from a gunshot wound and feeling the effects of his age, John and the team welcome two new rookies and continue the hunt for two dangerous inmates.

programme.title: Survivor Australia
programme.desc: A castaways strategy at Tribal Council succeeded, but now hes left without an Idol and facing a traitor within his ranks. Meanwhile, on the Brains tribe, the women unite under the banner of The Coven.

programme.title: Elsbeth
programme.desc: A thrilling season finale. When Elsbeth tries to solve a murder, she comes face-to-face with many familiar suspects.

programme.title: Americas Got Talent
programme.desc: In the 20th season of this Emmy-nominated reality competition, the search continues for the countrys best talent. Howie Mandel, Sofía Vergara, and Simon Cowell return, joined by Mel B.

programme.title: Allegiance
programme.desc: When a groom is stabbed at a lavish Indian wedding, the attempted murder is just the tip of the iceberg as multiple motives are uncovered, including fraud, organised crime, and shady international schools.

programme.title: FBI: Most Wanted
programme.desc: Remy calls in the Fugitive Task Force after ex-girlfriend judge April Brooks is assaulted by a serial rapist. Meanwhile, Remy decides to take the next step in his relationship with Abby.

programme.title: Lockerbie: A Search For Truth
programme.desc: As Jim continues his campaign for truth and justice, two suspects are indicted for the bombing, and his focus has to shift to the fight to bring the men to trial.

programme.title: Hacks
programme.desc: When Late Night is forced to censor an interview, Deborah and Ava get inadvertently embroiled in controversy. Meanwhile, Jimmy hits rock bottom, and Kayla gains clarity about where she belongs.

programme.title: Hacks
programme.desc: In a tension-filled finale, Deborah deals with a difficult contract negotiation.

programme.title: Chicago PD
programme.desc: Atwater struggles to find balance as he teams up with a forensic psychologist on an armed robbery case.

programme.title: Teacup
programme.sub-title: In The Heart Of The Country
programme.desc: James and Ruben are held captive at the farm, Arlo, Meryl and Nicholas meet a mysterious man.

programme.title: Dexter: Resurrection
programme.desc: Dexter embeds himself in New Yorks ride-share community to track down a serial killer. Meanwhile, Harrison spirals from the guilt of a violent outburst.

programme.title: Last Week Tonight With John Oliver
programme.desc: John Oliver discusses the hiring of Bari Weiss as the new editor-in-chief of CBS News.

programme.title: Reyka
programme.desc: Speelman slips through Reykas fingers but has to seek refuge in the harbour underworld. Reyka draws links between the cobber shop and Lovers Lane murders but struggles to unlock the killers identity.

programme.title: Bookie
programme.desc: While Lorraine takes Walt on a spiritual business trip, Hector recruits Danny and Ray to help collect on a soccer bet from a notorious drug lord.

programme.title: Survivor Australia
programme.desc: A castaways strategy at Tribal Council succeeded, but now hes left without an Idol and facing a traitor within his ranks. Meanwhile, on the Brains tribe, the women unite under the banner of The Coven.

programme.title: The Big Trip 3: Race Around The World
programme.desc: Mik-Mik, his family, and friends embark on their greatest adventure as a clumsy stork delivers the wrong baby again, and they search for it.

programme.title: Happys Place
programme.desc: When Bobbie catches Isabella doing a slow fade breakup with her long-distance boyfriend, she convinces her to send a Dear John letter.

programme.title: Americas Got Talent
programme.desc: In the 20th season of this Emmy-nominated reality competition, the search continues for the countrys best talent. Howie Mandel, Sofía Vergara, and Simon Cowell return, joined by Mel B.

programme.title: Chicago Med
programme.desc: The hospital faces a staffing crisis as the nurses stage a sick-out. Archer and Frost bet on who can discharge their patients first. Charles distrust of a patient complicates his treatment.

programme.title: Summertide
programme.desc: Tristan wants to help Yolande dance again. Martins suspicions of Lourens grow, and he confronts Charlie. Estella convinces Rebecca with a plan to burn down Salt and Fire.

programme.title: Summertide
programme.desc: A major accident devastates the Field and Solomons families. The families come together to support each other in grief.

programme.title: Watson
programme.desc: Ingrids lies come back to haunt her when her sister Gigi needs to be treated by the team after she develops side effects to the secret treatments Ingrid put her through.

programme.title: Americas Got Talent
programme.desc: In the 20th season of this Emmy-nominated reality competition, the search continues for the countrys best talent. Howie Mandel, Sofía Vergara, and Simon Cowell return, joined by Mel B.

programme.title: Red Eye
programme.desc: The truth emerges about events on board forcing Hana to take drastic action.

programme.title: Survivor Australia
programme.desc: After losing a member at the previous Tribal Council, its girls versus guys as The Coven realise theyre now in the minority.

programme.title: Chicago Med
programme.desc: Maggie and Frost fight to get lungs for a young cystic fibrosis patient. Hannah learns whether she can become a surrogate. Ripley and Morris treat the daughter of a tech billionaire with leukaemia.

programme.title: Americas Got Talent
programme.desc: In the 20th season of this Emmy-nominated reality competition, the search continues for the countrys best talent. Howie Mandel, Sofía Vergara, and Simon Cowell return, joined by Mel B.

programme.title: Law and Order: Organized Crime
programme.desc: Bernies health declines as the Collective activist group ramps up its body count, Stabler is pulled between family and the case.

programme.title: Law and Order Toronto: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: A stabbing in the PATH leads Graff and Bateman to one of the most scandalous data breaches in Torontos history.

programme.title: And Just Like That...
programme.desc: When Carrie and Miranda each deal with noisy neighbour situations, their temporary solution proves even more frustrating.

programme.title: Steinheist
programme.desc: Steinheist continues to untangle the story after Steinhoffs shareholders voted to dissolve the company and delist it from the Johannesburg and Frankfurt stock exchanges.

programme.title: Chicago PD
programme.desc: ASA Chapman assists Intelligence with a sensitive investigation that drudges up painful memories for Voight.

programme.title: Hacks
programme.desc: When Late Night is forced to censor an interview, Deborah and Ava get inadvertently embroiled in controversy. Meanwhile, Jimmy hits rock bottom, and Kayla gains clarity about where she belongs.

programme.title: Hacks
programme.desc: In a tension-filled finale, Deborah deals with a difficult contract negotiation.

programme.title: FBI: Most Wanted
programme.desc: Remy calls in the Fugitive Task Force after ex-girlfriend judge April Brooks is assaulted by a serial rapist. Meanwhile, Remy decides to take the next step in his relationship with Abby.

programme.title: Isibaya
programme.desc: Sbu is desperate to comfort Thandeka, but his father prevents him. What will happen to Buhle when Iris discovers that she burnt her favourite blouse? Fezile and Shadrack worry about how to maintain calm among the men.

programme.title: Genesis
programme.desc: A redeemed gospel star basks in loves restoration, unaware of the storm brewing. A charming prince wrestles with guilt as a life-changing announcement looms.

programme.title: Suidooster
programme.desc: Aiden wonders why Frankie is suddenly breaking her own records. Mymoena struggles to let go of her belongings, and Nazeem tempts Wade with an offer that could cause big trouble.

programme.desc: Expect high drama, passion and intrigue as we follow the trials and tribulations of a handful of families in Johannesburg. Created by Franz Marx (Agter Elke Man), Egoli was South Africas first soap opera.

programme.desc: Thandeka blames herself for the death in their family while Iris and Jabu arrive like fish out of water in the Valley. Fezile nearly triggers a war, but surprisingly Samson uses it as an opportunity to maintain peace.

programme.desc: Vuyiseka tells Khosi that she is willing to help Khosi get medication for the people in Kwa Majola Village. The tribal elders are determined to make Longamo pay for his sins.
